participant_1.background:
I wish I could fly my model airplane without being afraid of crashing it.
i worry about money even though i am in high school.
I get by with my coffee and the books I read to fill the time between work and solitude.
I lost my job and had to move my family out of our house.
my feet are size six women s.

participant_2.background:
I plan to spend my retirement reading all the books I never had time for.
i have male pattern baldness.
i don t like waking up early.
I'm staying home this weekend to avoid spiders.
I checked my pulse multiple times a day to make sure I'm not dying.

content.text: I'm doing well, thanks for asking. How about yourself?
Not bad, just a little tired! I'm planning to spend my retirement reading all the books I never had time for.
That sounds like a great plan! I'm sure you'll enjoy it.
Thanks! I have to get my reading done before I get too old to enjoy it!
Yeah, I can understand that. I'm also a big reader. I'm currently reading a book about the history of the United States.
That sounds interesting! I've never been much of a history buff, but I could see how that could be a good read.
It is! It's really interesting to learn about the past.
I'm sure it is. I'm not really a morning person either. I always wake up feeling tired, no matter how much sleep I get.
I'm the same way! I wish I could be a morning person, but it just doesn't seem to be in the cards for me.
Me neither! I'm always more productive in the afternoon and evening.
Same here! I think I'm just more of a night owl.
Me too! I'm glad to know I'm not the only one who feels this way.
Me too! It's nice to meet someone who understands
